mapper.sql: t.id, t.create_by AS "createBy.id", t.create_date, t.update_by AS "updateBy.id", t.update_date, t.del_flag, t.remarks, t.address, t.property_owner, t.house_property, t.house_acreage, t.ownership_number, t.mortgages_number, t.impawn_order, t.preorder_mortgage_amount, t.sealed_order, t.first_seizure_court, t.building_structure, t.completion_date, t.layer_number, t.total_layer_number, t.rent_out, t.minors, t.only_housing, t.lei_housing
